body.contents: Click the buttons below to toggle the datapack settings

actions.label: Wooly Cow Shearing
actions.tooltip: Allows you to shear wooly cows by punching them with shears

actions.label: Flower Cow Shearing
actions.tooltip: Allows you to shear flower cows by punching them with shears, turning them back into regular cows

actions.label: Responsive Muddy Pigs
actions.tooltip: Makes muddy pigs dry out in warm biomes, restore their mud when standing on it, and lose their mud when in water

actions.label: Check Current Settings
actions.tooltip: I can't figure out how to make the buttons say if its enabled or not so this is the next best thing
